fields.description: This path is invalid if 'Continuous Capture' is provided with 'true' or 'false'. A valid local path on the targeting VM. Must include the name of the capture file (*.cap). For linux virtual machine it must start with /var/captures. Required if no storage ID is provided, otherwise optional.
fields.name: FilePath

fields.description: This path is valid if 'Continuous Capture' is provided with 'true' or 'false' and required if no storage ID is provided, otherwise optional. Must include the name of the capture file (*.cap). For linux virtual machine it must start with /var/captures.
fields.name: LocalPath

fields.description: The ID of the storage account to save the packet capture session. Required if no localPath or filePath is provided.
fields.name: StorageId

fields.description: The URI of the storage path to save the packet capture. Must be a well-formed URI describing the location to save the packet capture.
fields.name: StoragePath
